       <td align="right" style="white-space:nowrap;">
        <span class="lgsearch">

         <table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0">

            </div>

    <div id="commentslistp2950411" style="display:none; margin:0px 10px;">

    <div id="content">
     <div id="contentleft" style="width:230px;">
      <div id="leftboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox10536999">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="10536999">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title10536999">
          <div class="bi_text">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Defining Key Terms
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_1" id="content10536999">
          <p>
           You may be wondering what we mean when we refer to
           <em>
            scholarly
           </em>
           versus
           <em>
            popular
           </em>
           .
          </p>
          <ul>
           <li>
            <strong>
             Scholarly:
            </strong>
            In-depth, research-based articles, books, and book chapters, written by scholars and experts and intended for other researchers, experts, and students.
           </li>
           <li>
            <strong>
             Popular:
            </strong>
            Articles, books, and book chapters written by journalists or professional writers for a general audience in common language (e.g., newspapers and magazines).
           </li>
          </ul>
          <p style="padding-left: 30px;" class="MsoNormal">
           <em>
            Learn more:
            <a href="http://libraryguides.muhlenberg.edu/content.php?pid=471100&amp;sid=4047073">
             What is Scholarly?
            </a>
            <a href="http://libraryguides.muhlenberg.edu/content.php?pid=471100&amp;sid=4047073">
            </a>
           </em>
          </p>
          <p>
           While we're at it, how about a few more key terms...
          </p>
          <ul>
           <li>
            <strong>
             Peer-Reviewed:
            </strong>
            A process through which some scholarly articles and book chapters are critically evaluated by experts with in-depth knowledge of the research area before publication in order to ensure the information is valid, credible, well-written, and of high quality.
            <span>
             &nbsp;
            </span>
            <strong>
            </strong>
           </li>
           <li>
            <strong>
             Literature:
            </strong>
            Scholarly articles, books, and book chapters published on a particular subject.
           </li>
          </ul>
          <div id="boxatt10536999" class="boxatt">
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox10537002">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="10537002">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title10537002">
          <div class="bi_text">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Verifying Peer-Review
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_1" id="content10173314">
          <p>
           Are you looking especially for
           <strong>
            peer-reviewed
           </strong>
           articles?&nbsp;
          </p>
          <ul>
           <li>
            Many databases will tell you if an article has been peer-reviewed.&nbsp; You may even be able to use limits or filters in the database to narrow your search results.&nbsp;
           </li>
           <li>
            If you're still not sure if an article has been peer-reviewed, search the name of the journal in which the article was published in
            <a href="http://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://ulrichsweb.serialssolutions.com/">
             Ulrichsweb Periodicals Directory
            </a>
            .&nbsp; The symbol of a referee's jersey next to the journal name indicates the journal uses peer review.&nbsp; (Refereed is a synonym for peer reviewed.)&nbsp; Note, though, that not all content in peer-reviewed journals is actually peer-reviewed; book or film reviews, letters to the editors, opinion columns, and articles without references are typically not peer-reviewed.
           </li>
          </ul>
          <div id="boxatt10173314" class="boxatt">
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div id="contentcenter" style="width:520px;padding-left:0px; margin-left:0px; margin-right:8px; float:left;">
      <div id="centerboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox10361552">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="10361552">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title10361552">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Core Databases for Scholarly Literature
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content10361552">
          <div id="boxatt10361552" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link12706271">
              <a id="link_12706271" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://www.ciaonet.org/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12706271,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Political Science Subject Guide', 'page_name' : 'Finding Articles'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12706271}); ">
               Columbia International Affairs Online (CIAO)
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               A database of scholarly journal articles, working papers, policy briefs, conference proceedings, and more in the area of international affairs theory and research.  Full text is linked directly in the database.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link12706272">
              <a id="link_12706272" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.proquest.com/pais/ip?accountid=40980" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12706272,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Political Science Subject Guide', 'page_name' : 'Finding Articles'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12706272}); ">
               PAIS
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Citations from scholarly journal articles, books, book chapters, policy briefs, government publications, and more from on domestic and international political, economic, social and public policy issues.  Use the Check for Full Text buttons to check for full text online or in the library.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link12706275">
              <a id="link_12706275" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.proquest.com/wpsashell/ip?accountid=40980" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12706275,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Political Science Subject Guide', 'page_name' : 'Finding Articles'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12706275}); ">
               Worldwide Political Science Abstracts
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Citations from scholarly journal articles, books, book chapters, policy briefs, government publications, and more in political science and complementary fields, including international relations, law, and public administration/policy.  Use the Check for Full Text buttons to check for full text online or in the library.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox10453318">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="10453318">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title10453318">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Other Recommended Databases for Scholarly Literature
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content10453318">
          <div id="boxatt10453318" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link12706308">
              <a id="link_12706308" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=a9h" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12706308,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Political Science Subject Guide', 'page_name' : 'Finding Articles'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12335038}); ">
               Academic Search Complete
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               A database of both scholarly and popular publications in a wide variety of disciplines and subject areas, including political science. Most full text is linked directly in the database; otherwise use the Check for Full Text buttons to check for full text online or in the library.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link12706311">
              <a id="link_12706311" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=ahl" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12706311,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Political Science Subject Guide', 'page_name' : 'Finding Articles'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12706311}); ">
               America: History and Life
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               A database of scholarly journal articles, books, book chapter, book reviews, dissertations, and more in U.S. and Canadian history.  Some full text is linked directly in the database; otherwise use the Check for Full Text buttons to check for full text online or in the library.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link12706319">
              <a id="link_12706319" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.proquest.com/assiashell/ip?accountid=40980" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12706319,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Political Science Subject Guide', 'page_name' : 'Finding Articles'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12335152}); ">
               ASSIA: Applied Social Sciences Index and Abstracts
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Citations to scholarly journals in sociology, psychology, political science, health, social work, education, and more.  Use the Check for Full Text buttons to check for full text online or in the library.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link12706322">
              <a id="link_12706322" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.proquest.com/econlitshell/ip?accountid=40980" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12706322,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Political Science Subject Guide', 'page_name' : 'Finding Articles'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12706322}); ">
               EconLit
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Citations from scholarly journal articles, books, book chapter, working papers, conference papers, and more in economics. Especially useful for research on a country's economic policies, development issues, and trade.  Use the Check for Full Text buttons to check for full text online or in the library.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link12706339">
              <a id="link_12706339" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=30h" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12706339,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Political Science Subject Guide', 'page_name' : 'Finding Articles'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12706339}); ">
               Historical Abstracts with Full Text
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               A database of scholarly journal articles, books, book chapter, book reviews, dissertations, and more for world history (excluding U.S. and Canada). Some full text is linked directly in the database; otherwise use the Check for Full Text buttons to check for full text online or in the library.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link12706350">
              <a id="link_12706350" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://www.jstor.org/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12706350,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Political Science Subject Guide', 'page_name' : 'Finding Articles'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12364481}); ">
               JSTOR
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               A database of scholarly journals for most academic disciplines. The most recent three to five years of most journals are not included.  Full text is linked directly in the database.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link12706354">
              <a id="link_12706354" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=ofm" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12706354,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Political Science Subject Guide', 'page_name' : 'Finding Articles'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12364517}); ">
               Omnifile
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               A database of scholarly and non-scholarly journals covering various subjects including general sciences, humanities, social sciences, and business.  Most full text is linked directly in the database; otherwise use the Check for Full Text buttons to check for full text online or in the library.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox21331707">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="21331707">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title21331707">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Recommended Databases and Websites for Think Tank Reports
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content21331707">
          <p>
           SEE ALSO THE CORE DATABASES FOR SCHOLARLY ARTICLES. PAIS, Worldwide Political Science Abstracts, and CIAO all include some think tank reports
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt21331707" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link24836334">
              <a id="link_24836334" href="http://guides.library.harvard.edu/hks/think_tank_search" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24836334,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Political Science Subject Guide', 'page_name' : 'Finding Articles'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 24836334}); ">
               Think Tank Search (Harvard Kennedy School)
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               "Think Tank Search is a custom Google search of more than 450 think tank websites. For the purposes of this search, think tanks are defined as institutions affiliated with universities, governments, advocacy groups, foundations, non-governmental organizations, and businesses that generate public policy research, analysis, and activity. Inclusion is based upon the relevancy of subject area to HKS [Harvard Kennedy School] coursework and scholarship, the availability of the think tank’s research in full-text on the website, and the think tank’s reputation and influence upon policy making. The list represents a mixture of partisan and non-partisan think tanks."
               <br />
               &gt;&gt;See also the "US" and "Non-US" tabs for lists of and links to individual think tanks.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox10720190">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="10720190">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title10720190">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Using Encompass Search for Scholarly and Popular Articles
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content10719765">
          <p>
           Encompass Search finds information by searching through a massive collection of books and scholarly journals, as well as newspapers and magazines, dissertations, conference proceedings, music, video, maps, and more.
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt10719765" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link13011281">
              <a id="link_13011281" href="http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(13011281,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Political Science Subject Guide', 'page_name' : 'Finding Articles'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 13011281}); ">
               Encompass Search
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               To find only articles, use the Article limit on the left sidebar of your search results page.  Use the Peer-reviewed limit to narrow further to scholarly sources that have been peer-reviewed.  Some full text is linked directly; otherwise, use the Access Online buttons to check for full text online or in the library.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox10453488">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="10453488">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title10453488">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Core Databases and Websites for Popular Literature
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content10453488">
          <div id="boxatt10453488" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link12706361">
              <a id="link_12706361" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=a9h" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12706361,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Political Science Subject Guide', 'page_name' : 'Finding Articles'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12335038}); ">
               Academic Search Complete
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               A database of both scholarly and popular publications in a wide variety of disciplines and subject areas, including media and communication. Most full text is linked directly in the database; otherwise use the Check for Full Text buttons to check for full text online or in the library.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link12706364">
              <a id="link_12706364" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://www.lexisnexis.com/hottopics/lnacademic" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12706364,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Political Science Subject Guide', 'page_name' : 'Finding Articles'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12369574}); ">
               LexisNexis Academic
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               A database of popular newspapers, magazines, and broadcast transcripts, as well as business publications, legal materials, and more.  Full text is linked directly in the database.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link12706409">
              <a id="link_12706409" href="http://www.mondotimes.com/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12706409,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Political Science Subject Guide', 'page_name' : 'Finding Articles'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12706409}); ">
               Mondo Times -- the Worldwide News Media Guide
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Links to local media in the United States and worldwide, including newspaper, TV stations, news radio stations, and online news sources.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link12706362">
              <a id="link_12706362" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=ofm" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12706362,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Political Science Subject Guide', 'page_name' : 'Finding Articles'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12364517}); ">
               Omnifile
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               A database of scholarly and non-scholarly journals covering various subjects including general sciences, humanities, social sciences, and business.  Most full text is linked directly in the database; otherwise use the Check for Full Text buttons to check for full text online or in the library.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link12706363">
              <a id="link_12706363" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=rgr" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12706363,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Political Science Subject Guide', 'page_name' : 'Finding Articles'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12706363}); ">
               Readers' Guide Retrospective
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Citations to general-interest magazines and newspapers published in the United States for the period 1890-1982.  Some full text is linked directly in the database; otherwise use the Check for Full Text buttons to check for full text online or in the library.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div id="contentright" style="width:209px;float:left; padding-right:0px;">
      <div id="profile2950411" class="profile_wrapper">
       <div class="roundbox outerbox">
        <div class="roundbox headerbox">
         <table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" width="100%">
          <tr>
           <td>
            <h2>
             Get Help
            </h2>
           </td>
          </tr>
         </table>
        </div>
        <div class="roundbox innerboxprofile" style="padding:5px;">
         <table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" width="100%">
          <tr>
           <td>
            <div class="profile_image_box" id="profile_image_box_63913">
             <a href="http://libraryguides.muhlenberg.edu/profile.php?uid=63913" title="View Profile">
              <img alt="Profile Image" border="0" src="//lgimages.s3.amazonaws.com/data/profiles/63913/jarson.jpg" class="profile_image_align profileimage" style="max-width:140px;" />
             </a>
             <div class="profile_display_name">
              Jen Jarson
             </div>
            </div>
            <div class="profileh4">
             <div class="profilecontent">
              <b>
               Contact Info
              </b>
              <br />
              jarson@muhlenberg.edu
              <br />
              484.664.3552
              <br />
              <a href="mailto:jarson@muhlenberg.edu">
               Send Email
              </a>
              <br />
             </div>
             <div id="profile_links" class="profilecontent">
              <b>
               Links:
              </b>
              <br />
              <a href="http://libraryguides.muhlenberg.edu/profile.php?uid=63913" id="profile_link">
               Profile &amp; Guides
              </a>
             </div>
            </div>
           </td>
          </tr>
         </table>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
      <div id="rightboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox10537005">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="10537005">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title10537005">
          <div class="bi_text">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           How do I get the full text of my article?
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_1" id="content10536644">
          <p>
           To get the full text of an article, consider the following options:
          </p>
          <p>
           - If you are in Encompass Search or a library database, look for "Check for Full Text buttons," "Access Online," or "Check eResources" buttons. These buttons will take you the full text of the article or tell you that the full text cannot be found. If the full text is not available from Trexler Library, look for buttons to request the item from another library via interlibrary loan. Or go directly to the
           <a href="http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu/services/interlibrary-loan.html">
            interlibrary loan
           </a>
           request forms.
          </p>
          <p>
           - If you have citation information for the article (i.e., journal title, article title, publication year, etc.), type the information about your article in
           <a href="http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu/">
            Encompass Search
           </a>
           on the library website. If the library subscribes to the full text, you will be directed to the article (see first bullet above). If not, you can request a copy of the article via
           <a href="http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu/services/interlibrary-loan.html">
            interlibrary loan
           </a>
           .
          </p>
          <p>
           - If Trexler Library does not have access to the full text of the article, search
           <a href="http://www.google.com/scholar">
            Google Scholar
           </a>
           by article title to see if the author has made a copy freely available online. If not, you can request a copy of the article via
           <a href="http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu/services/interlibrary-loan.html">
            interlibrary loan
           </a>
           .
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt10536644" class="boxatt">
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
    </div>
